name: What's Playing
tagline: An Add-on for Mozilla Firefox to display desktop notifications for Spotify and other music websites
body:
### Installing the Add-on
Visit the [Firefox Add-ons website](https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/what-s-playing/) on Firefox to get the Add-on. 

### Usage
Play a song on Spotify Web Player or Songza and see desktop notifications when a new song starts. You can also find out what song is playing at the moment by clicking on "What's Playing Now" from the context menu (right-click in a Firefox page).

### Not Seeing Notifications?
If you are on a Mac, make sure notifications are enabled and Do Not Disturb is not on (especially if you are using an external display).

### Contribute or Request a Feature
[Fork](https://github.com/nishanths/what-s-playing) What's Playing on GitHub. If you want to see a new feature or support for another music website or find the Add-on not working, please contact me by [email](mailto:nishanth.gerrard@gmail.com) or on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nshanmugham/).

### License
